content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Electronic Circuit Factory at position(x=9.5, y=11.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 803 electronic circuits

###Power Generation System at position(x=-7.0, y=24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Water pipe network at positions(-9.5,23.5),(-8.5,23.5),(-8.5,22.5),(-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) with coal fuel
- Steam pipe network at positions(-5.5,24.5),(-5.5,25.5),(-5.5,26.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electricity pole network connecting various entities

###Science Lab Setup
Consists of:
- Multiple labs connected to power grid
- Input chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs to lab

###Smelting Area
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces have coal fuel but are currently idle

ERROR TIPS

### Research prerequisite errors
- Research technologies in correct order following the prerequisite tree:
  - Research fluid-handling before oil processing
  - Research engine before fluid-handling
  - Research oil-processing before plastics
  - Research plastics before advanced-electronics
  - Research advanced-electronics before chemical-science-pack
  - Research modules before productivity-module
  - Research chemical-science-pack before advanced-material-processing-2
  - Research lubricant before electric-engine

### Already researched technology errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research:
  - Fast inserter
  - Automation 2
  - Military
  - Steel processing
  - Advanced material processing
  - Electronics

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure assembling machines have all required ingredients before operation:
  - Electronic circuit assembler needs iron plates and copper cables
